00023 /* BPDU formats: 9.1 - 9.3, 17.28 */
00024  
00025 #ifndef _STP_BPDU_H__
00026 #define _STP_BPDU_H__
00027 
00028 //tolua_begin
00029 #define MIN_BPDU                7
00030 #define BPDU_L_SAP              0x42
00031 #define LLC_UI                  0x03
00032 #define BPDU_PROTOCOL_ID        0x0000
00033 #define BPDU_VERSION_ID         0x00
00034 #define BPDU_VERSION_RAPID_ID   0x02
00035 
00036 #define BPDU_TOPO_CHANGE_TYPE   0x80
00037 #define BPDU_CONFIG_TYPE        0x00
00038 #define BPDU_RSTP               0x02
00039 
00040 #define TOLPLOGY_CHANGE_BIT     0x01
00041 #define PROPOSAL_BIT            0x02
00042 #define PORT_ROLE_OFFS          2   /* 0x04 & 0x08 */
00043 #define PORT_ROLE_MASK          (0x03 << PORT_ROLE_OFFS)
00044 #define LEARN_BIT               0x10
00045 #define FORWARD_BIT             0x20
00046 #define AGREEMENT_BIT           0x40
00047 #define TOLPLOGY_CHANGE_ACK_BIT 0x80
00048 
00049 #define RSTP_PORT_ROLE_UNKN     0x00
00050 #define RSTP_PORT_ROLE_ALTBACK  0x01
00051 #define RSTP_PORT_ROLE_ROOT     0x02
00052 #define RSTP_PORT_ROLE_DESGN    0x03
00053 
00054 typedef struct mac_header_t {
00055   unsigned char dst_mac[6];
00056   unsigned char src_mac[6];
00057 } MAC_HEADER_T;
00058 
00059 typedef struct eth_header_t {
00060   unsigned char len8023[2];
00061   unsigned char dsap;
00062   unsigned char ssap;
00063   unsigned char llc;
00064 } ETH_HEADER_T;
00065 
00066 typedef struct bpdu_header_t {
00067   unsigned char protocol[2];
00068   unsigned char version;
00069   unsigned char bpdu_type;
00070 } BPDU_HEADER_T;
00071 
00072 typedef struct bpdu_body_t {
00073   unsigned char flags;
00074   unsigned char root_id[8];
00075   unsigned char root_path_cost[4];
00076   unsigned char bridge_id[8];
00077   unsigned char port_id[2];
00078   unsigned char message_age[2];
00079   unsigned char max_age[2];
00080   unsigned char hello_time[2];
00081   unsigned char forward_delay[2];
00082 } BPDU_BODY_T;
00083 
00084 typedef struct stp_bpdu_t {
00085   ETH_HEADER_T  eth;
00086   BPDU_HEADER_T hdr;
00087   BPDU_BODY_T   body;
00088   unsigned char ver_1_len[2];
00089 } BPDU_T;
00090 
00091 typedef struct rstp_bpdu_t {
00092   MAC_HEADER_T  mac;
00093   ETH_HEADER_T  eth;
00094   BPDU_HEADER_T hdr;
00095   BPDU_BODY_T   body;
00096   unsigned char ver_1_len[2];
00097 } RBPDU_T;
00098 //tolua_end
00099 #endif /* _STP_BPDU_H__ */
